item.title: Lightbend Academy
item.description: Some notes regarding Lighbend academy at https://academy.lightbend.com/. Taking this opportunity as it is free during this summer. Hope to learn more about Reactive + Akka + Actors + Streams. Hmmm… is Data Engineering something I would like to work with? :thinking: Glossary Data at Rest: Data that is not consumed at the time is injested. It is stored and then consumed later in a batch process. Introduction to Reactive Systems Context: Increasing complexity which requires many nodes (2-3 on simpler) and far more nodes on more complex systems.
